title: How do I view my full purchase history?
body: Id like to do this because when i first started doing league I spent RP on champions and ill like to refund them. Is there any way i can view my full purchase history?

replies.body: When talking about refunds, you should be able to issue some on your own by using the refund tokens you start with. Traditionally, we can only refund things up to 90 days back, and content that's already been used may not be able to be refunded (since they were bought, used, and then buyers remorse set in). Still, check out the [**content refund faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864), then reach out to our billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if this is something we can refund for you.
